'''1.9.1-pre2''' is the second pre-release for [[1.9.1]].<ref name=blogpost>http://www.mojang.com/2016/03/minecraft-191-pre-release-1/</ref><ref>{{tweet|SeargeDP|707948976478277632|Minecraft 1.9.1 Pre-Release 2 is now uploaded to the launcher. The blog post at http://www.mojang.com/2016/03/minecr … will be updated in a few minutes.|Mar 10, 2016}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Shield]]s'''
* No longer take damage when blocking weak attacks (less than {{hp|3}} damage).

=== Entities ===
'''[[Minecarts with chest]]s & [[minecarts with hopper]]s'''
* The title of the inventory now match the item's name.

=== Gameplay ===
'''Combat'''
* Missing triggers weapon cooldown again if the cooldown was 75% or more recharged (later reverted in final release).

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.9.1 Pre-Release 2|prefix=Minecraft
|;From release version 1.9
|98461|Several languages (at least Frisian, Talossan, Ripuarian, Lojban, and LOLCAT) are not selectable, "Eesti (Eesti)" is listed as "Inglise (US)".
|98587|Command block logic sometimes fails arbitrarily.
|99060|Elytra glowing effect is always black.
|99697|Typos in minecarts with hoppers and chests, reading "<code>container.minecart</code>".
|;previous
|99395|Closing fence on mob crashes the game.
}}
'''Other fixes:'''
* "Fixed crash in pathfinding code (CME)".<ref name="blogpost" /> (ConcurrentModificationException)</onlyinclude>
